title: Riot prizing comes to Teamfight Tactics!

replies.body: {{sticker:sg-ezreal}} Now I just need to find 31 friends.
let me know when you hit 31 upvotes...

> We require a minimum of eight participating teams for events to receive prizing. We hold the right to deny prizing if a tournament cannot provide adequate proof that this requirement was fulfilled.

Does this mean 8 players or is it different for TFT
> [If you are running a TFT tournament of at least 32 players, you can apply.](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-events/riot-prizing-comes-teamfight-tactics)
